title: General
stimulusHtml:
1 point(s) maximum

Description (2 points; 1 point per row)

Structure

• Starch synthase conformation/shape will change

• Enzyme will become (partially) denatured

Prediction (1 point)

• Starch content will be less than it would be at optimal temperatures
